resources.string: Go to Testing when ready to test the network in the facility
Go to Tools to view additional network stats and access network tools
Test your area by clicking Start Session
Sends an ICMP packet to your destination address
Tracks real-time pathway from source to destination.\nNote: Max of 64 hops
Run a speed test, downloads on average 10 megabytes of data to determine download speeds.
Please wait until allotted time is complete…
Tap To Connect To A WIFI Network
